query:
MATCH p =
  (a:Group)
    -[:CoerceAndRelayToSMB
      |:MSSQL_HostFor
      |:MSSQL_Contains*1..]
    ->(:MSSQL_Database)
    -[:SCCM_AssignAllPermissions]
    ->()
    -[:SCCM_AdminsReplicatedTo]
    ->(:SCCM_Site)
WHERE a.name CONTAINS 'AUTHENTICATED USERS'
RETURN p
name: SCCM Hierarchy TAKEOVER-2
